data.title: Chung Hwa Correspondence School Admission Letter: Chcs@ccu - Edu.tw
data.meta_description: Eng - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document is an admission letter for the Chung Hwa Correspondence School outlining guidelines for students taking online and correspondence courses in 2011. It provides the school contact information and instructions on accessing course handouts online, submitting assignments by their due dates, and how to check assignment results. Students are informed that failure to submit assignments by deadlines may affect future course enrollments and that course inquiries should be sent separately from assignment submissions.
